00028 ColorBasedROIExtractorHSV::ColorBasedROIExtractorHSV() {
00029         this->maxH = 255;
00030         this->minH      = 0;
00031 
00032         this->maxS = 255;
00033         this->minS      = 0;
00034 
00035         this->maxV = 255;
00036         this->minV      = 0;
00037 
00038 }

00102 void ColorBasedROIExtractorHSV::filter(brics_3d::PointCloud3D* originalPointCloud,
00103                 brics_3d::PointCloud3D* resultPointCloud){
00104 
00105         if(this->minS == 0 && this->minH == 0 && this->minV == 0 && this->maxH == 255 &&
00106                         this->maxS == 255 && this->maxV == 255) {
00107                 printf("[WARNING] Using maximum limits for HSV based ROI Extraction!!!\n");
00108         }
00109 
00110         int cloudSize = originalPointCloud->getSize();
00111         double tempH, tempS, tempV;
00112         int tempR, tempG, tempB;
00113         uint8_t tempChar;
00114         bool passed;
00115         brics_3d::ColorSpaceConvertor colorConvertor;
00116         brics_3d::Point3D tempPoint3D;
00117         resultPointCloud->getPointCloud()->clear();
00118 
00119         printf("Used H-S Limits for extraction: H:[%f %f] S:[%f %f]\n", minH, maxH, minS, maxS);
00120         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(cloudSize); i++) {
00121                 passed = false;
00122 
00123                 if( (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D() == 0) {
00124                         continue; //this point does not contain color information so skip it
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 //Getting the HSV values for the RGB points
00128                 tempChar = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D()->getR();
00129                 tempR = tempChar << 0;
00130                 tempR = abs(tempR);
00131 
00132                 tempChar = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D()->getG();
00133                 tempG = tempChar << 0;
00134                 tempG = abs(tempG);
00135 
00136                 tempChar = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D()->getB();
00137                 tempB = tempChar << 0;
00138                 tempB = abs(tempB);
00139 
00140                 colorConvertor.rgbToHsv(tempR, tempG, tempB, &tempH, &tempS, &tempV);
00141                 if(minH < maxH){
00142 
00143 
00144                         //Checking the values with the set limits
00145                         if (tempH <= maxH && tempH >= minH) {
00146                                 if (tempS >= minS && tempS <= maxS) {
00147                                         passed=true;
00148 
00149                                 }
00150                         }
00151 
00152 
00153                         //              printf("H-S Limits: [%f %f %f %f]\n", minH, maxH, minS, maxS);
00154                         //              printf("Actual H-S Values: [%d %d %d %f %f]\n", tempR, tempG, tempB, tempH, tempS);
00155                         if(passed){
00156                                 resultPointCloud->addPointPtr((*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].clone());
00157                         }
00158 
00159 
00160                 }else {
00161 
00162                         //Checking the values with the set limits
00163                         if ((tempH <= 255 && tempH >= minH) || (tempH >= 0 && tempH <= maxH)) {
00164                                 if (tempS >= minS && tempS <= maxS) {
00165                                         passed=true;
00166 
00167                                 }
00168                         }
00169 
00170 
00171                         //              printf("H-S Limits: [%f %f %f %f]\n", minH, maxH, minS, maxS);
00172                         //              printf("Actual H-S Values: [%d %d %d %f %f]\n", tempR, tempG, tempB, tempH, tempS);
00173                         if(passed){
00174                                 resultPointCloud->addPointPtr((*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].clone());
00175                         }
00176                 }
00177         }
00178         //      printf("Output cloud size:%d\n", out_cloud->getSize());
00179 }
